// src/components/ProfileCard.js import React from 'react'; import './ProfileCard.css'; import Patrick from '../images/Patrick.png'; // Profile image import insta from '../images/instagram.svg'; // Instagram icon import whatsapp from '../images/whatsapp.svg'; // WhatsApp icon import github from '../images/github.svg'; // GitHub icon import linkedin from '../images/linkedin.svg'; // LinkedIn icon import gmail from '../images/gmail.svg'; // Gmail icon import tele from '../images/telegram.svg'; // Telegram icon import twitter from '../images/twitter.svg'; // Twitter icon const ProfileCard = ({ name, jobTitle, location, about }) => { return (

{"Patrick MS"}

{jobTitle}

{"Tiruchirappalli, INDIA"}

{/* About section */}

About

"I'm a passionate frontend developer"

{/* Social media links */}
); }; export default ProfileCard;
